Convert HEX color to RGBA.help: This tool will convert a HEX color code to RGBA. It will copy the result to your clipboard so that you can paste it where needed.

Copy containers to another layout.help: You can use this tool to quickly copy containers from one layout to another. It will skip Mega Menu containers and the Feature column.

Copy Google Translate Script.help: You can use this tool to quickly copy the mobile compatible Google Translate Script.

Copy main navigation dropdown to seconda.file: Copy main navigation dropdown to secondary navigation.js
Copy main navigation dropdown to seconda.help: You can use this tool to copy the Main Navigation dropdown styles to the secondary navigation (both menus and accordions).

Copy secondary navigation main item font.file: Copy secondary nav main item font styles to all secondary nav.js
Copy secondary navigation main item font.help: You can use this tool to copy the Secondary Navigation styles to the rest of the secondary navigation.

Copy widget skin component(s) to another.file: Copy widget skin component to another widget skin.js
Copy widget skin component(s) to another.help: You can use this tool to copy part of one widget skin to another.

Create example news items.help: You can use this tool to create example news flash items.

Create Sitemap.help: You can use this tool to create a text sitemap for a site.

Expand all items in task tracker.file: Expand all items in task tracker.js
Expand all items in task tracker.help: Expand all items in the task tracker

Fix bad JavaScript.help: Fix broken JavaScript in Custom HTML Widgets.
Fix bad JavaScript.helpPages: All pages with Live Edit Off

Generate Client PDF.help: Generate a client guide to colors, fonts, and images from any CivicPlus website.

Generate Project Timeline.help: Generate a branded project timeline to share with clients.

Import theme.help: Import a theme that was exported using the toolkit's 'Export current theme' tool.

Insert color palette code.help: You can use this tool to paste the Color Palette code. It will automatically strip out the message (From Design Center, copy and paste into console:) if copied as well.

Insert Government Websites by CivicPlus.help: This tool will inser the byline in a placed Custom HTML widget. You must upload the logo before running this tool (if applicable).

Open all pages.help: You can use this tool to open all pages on a site.

Prepend text to widget skins.help: Adds entered text to the beginning of each widget skin name.

Set inheritance on containers with widge.file: Set inheritance on containers with widgets.js
Set inheritance on containers with widge.help: You can use this tool to set the inheritance on containers. It will only set inheritance on containers that have widgets placed in them. It will skip setting the inheritance on Mega Menu containers and the Feature column.

Setup default Quick Links.help: This tool will setup 5 default Quick Link examples

Setup calendar widget skin.help: You can use this tool to set up a barebones Calendar widget skin. It will override any skins that have "Calendar" in their name.

Setup default theme options.help: This tool will automatically set a number of settings on the current Theme. It will then save the theme.

Setup default widget option sets.help: This tool will create some generic, reusable widget option sets.

Setup default widget skin.help: This tool will copy the theme's font/styles to a Default skin and save it.

Setup graphic links widget skin.help: This tool clears padding on a Graphic Links skin.

Setup popular Quick Links.help: This tool will setup Popular Quick Links (i.e. Copyright, Accessibility, etc.)

Setup Share/Site Tools widget skin.file: Setup Share and Site Tools widget skin.js
Setup Share/Site Tools widget skin.help: This tool adds padding, the background color, and font/link colors from the Main Nav Menu Item to the Share/Site Tools skin.

Setup defaults V2.help: This tool will automatically setup the theme, skins, accordians, etc., and then saves.

Setup Mega Menu.help: This tool will automatically setup the Mega Menu options on each main navigation item.

Copy Links.help: This tool will copy links and link text from selection.

Import Links.help: This tool will import links and link text which was copied from "Copy Links"

Sort Staff Directory.help: This tool will sort the staff directory alphabetically.
